Articles.Content: Well it's wesome but the IVAs are still brownish.
I have no IVA either
is there any way to change the decal?
I just got the compatibility patch, and lots of textures seem to have lost their paths, so I'm just getting grey models. Very nice models, but still!

Love the parts. I am noticing that if I put B9 wings or any wings other than yours on for that matter and see where my COL is, once I then place any of your wings (other wings still in place) your wings seem to take ALL the COL and not factor in the lift from the other wings.

Love the parts. I am noticing that if I put B9 wings or any wings other than yours on for that matter and see where my COL is, once I then place any of your wings (other wings still in place) your wings seem to take ALL the COL and not factor in the lift from the other wings.

No idea why that would happen. I didn't make the mod.
Is there any plans/configs for TweakScale compatability? I would love to use the wings on my larger planes.

To those still having issues regarding black textures in IVA, specifically with the Tandem & Mk13 cockpits:Here's an updated version that works with 0.90 and B9 R5.1.

The previous mod was pointing to the old location of B9 textures, but these were changed in R5.

To those still having issues regarding black textures in IVA, specifically with the Tandem & Mk13 cockpits:Here's an updated version that works with 0.90 and B9 R5.1.

The previous mod was pointing to the old location of B9 textures, but these were changed in R5.

you are a lifesaver. I've been wondering why they were all textureless.
this mod far compatible?

Some parts yes, some parts no. The wings and control surfaces are generally safe to use, but haven't been refined. Other parts aren't configured, but should generally be safe as they aren't lifting surfaces. I would avoid the rotors though, they make huge changes to the CoL with questionable compatibility. The rotor wing is especially bad as the CoL isn't adjusted when it changes configuration.
textures?

textures?

If your textures aren't working, either you need to update Firespitter or make sure you have B9 aerospace installed. (D12 uses B9 textures to save on RAM.)

I'm rather curious as to how nuFAR handles this now (old FAR rather hated the different wing shapes). Considering only minor updates were required on my install to get B9 working; think I'll try to get these back in and see.
PolecatEZ disappeared again...

Unfortunately. I mean that cockpits! That rotors! Omg I want them all!

Does someone has time, skill and the will to continue working on this?

So I got this, but I'm having problems with the textures. I have the most recent version of B9 and Firespitter. I'm running ksp 1.0.4. Also, the engines (rotors and propeller) seem to ignite with full throttle instantaneously. For example, with normal jet engines, even if start the engine with full throttle, it will build up gradually until it reaches it's maximum. With the engines on thins mod, it doesn't happen. If you start the engines with full throttle, thet start at maximum instantly.

I'm running ksp 1.0.4.

I think this is most of your problem right here, as B9 is still 0.90... unless you're talking about blowfish's dev version, in which case all bets are off.
Yes, I'm using Bowlfish's version. So, there's no solution?
PCanas, are you using ATM? I wonder if that's causing some issues--I'm going to tinker around with some stuff later this afternoon and find out...

...is it compatible with 1.0.5?
